page.title: 09COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: {Postal Services.}There is 1 Post Office in our area at West Street, Millbrook.A van goes to St.John on Wednesdays so the villagers can get stamps,cash allowances and pensions.In the area,delivery is made by van.All our post comes to Plymouth,then it is sent to Torpoint to be sorted there.In our area at present,we have 2 postmen. There are 3 post boxes around Millbrook and 1 at St. John.The area has a Plymouth postcode.{ {Telephone Services.}The number of people with telephones has increased. At school the ratio of people with telephones to those without is 13:1.A larger new exchange has been built in Millbrook to cope with demand.The area has Plymouth numbers beginning with 822 and 823.We have 4 public phone boxes at Millbrook and 1 at St. John.
